member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment
member.summary: Provides access to common application information.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.ApplicationName
member.summary: Gets the application name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.ApplicationVersion
member.summary: Gets the version of the application, as specified in the project.json file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.ApplicationBasePath
member.summary: Gets the base directory of the application, defined as the path to the directory containing the project.json file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.Configuration
member.summary: Gets the configuration. This should only be used for runtime compilation.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.RuntimeFramework
member.summary: Gets the target version and profile of the .NET Framework for the application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.GetData(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the specified value from Application Global Data.

remarks.para: Application Global Data is a collection of name-value pairs that is stored in a global set of data shared by the entire application. On Desktop CLR, this is backed by the and methods, and provides access to the same data. In other environments, such as CoreCLR, where AppDomains are not available, this data set is backed by a specially created global dictionary controlled by the implementor of this interface.
On Desktop CLR, this method can be used to retrieve predefined application domain properties. See for a complete list.

member.param: The name of the Application Global Data item to retrieve.
member.returns: The value of the item identified by , or null if no item exists.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.IApplicationEnvironment.SetData(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Sets the specified value in Application Global Data.

remarks.para: Application Global Data is a collection of name-value pairs that is stored in a global set of data shared by the entire application. On Desktop CLR, this is backed by the and methods, and provides access to the same data. In other environments, such as CoreCLR, where AppDomains are not available, this data set is backed by a specially created global dictionary controlled by the implementor of this interface.
On Desktop CLR, this method can be used to modify SOME predefined application domain properties. See for a complete list.

member.param: The name of the Application Global Data item to set.
The value to store in Application Global Data.

member.summary: Loads an unmanaged library by name.

member.returns: A handle to the unmanaged library or IntPtr.Zero if the library cannot be loaded.

member.summary: Loads an unmanaged library from the provided path.
member.param: The path to load the unmanaged library from.
member.returns: A handle to the unmanaged library or IntPtr.Zero if the library cannot be loaded.

member.summary: Adds an to the runtime.
member.returns: A disposable object representing the registration of the loader. Disposing it removes the loader from the runtime.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.ICompilerOptions

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library
member.summary: Exposes information about a library which can be an assembly, project, or a package.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the library.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library.Version
member.summary: Gets the version of the library.

member.summary: Gets the path to the library. For projects, this is a path to the project.json file.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library.Type
member.summary: Gets the type of library. Common values include Project, Package, and Assembly.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library.Dependencies
member.summary: Gets a list of dependencies for the library. The dependencies are names of other objects.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.PlatformAbstractions.Library.Assemblies
member.summary: Gets a list of assembly names from the library that can be loaded. Packages can contain multiple assemblies.
